message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. Let's get started with a price of $1100000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. Is that something we can work with?
I understand you're interested in the product, but $850000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $950000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $920000. Is that something we can work with?

I can see you're serious about getting a good deal, and I appreciate that. However, $920000 is still a bit lower than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering at $980000. Let's see if we can meet in the middle this time.
I appreciate your concessions, and I'm getting closer to what I'm willing to pay. I'm willing to meet you at $960000. Is that something we can work with?

I can see we're getting close to a deal, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $960000. However, I'm still a bit away from my target. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering at $990000. Let's see if we can get it done this time.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $990000, but I'm not comfortable going above that. I'm willing to meet you at $980000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. If we can't meet there, I'll have to consider other options.

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $990000. However, I'm willing to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I'll include a 1-year warranty and a comprehensive support package, which is normally valued at $50000. So, I'm counteroffering at $990000, plus the extras. What do you think?

I appreciate the extras, but I'm still not willing to pay $990000. I'll make a final offer of $980000, and that's as high as I'm willing to go. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
